donor_name: BRA-Fundo Nac Des Cient e Tec
outputs.output_descr: The objective of this project is the cooperation between UNDP and FINEP  for its capacity for holding events and activities that promote the integration of the various actors in the innovation process, enrich the debate on sustainable development and encourage the mobilization of society around the issue. The project will achieve this through the following 9 Outcomes and their related Outputs: (i) Methodological  concepts and content of the Fair prepared and structured; (ii) Mobilization activities, communication and awareness of the various national and international actors designed and developed; (iii) Dissemination  and communication of the Fair held; (iv) Technology infrastructure and logistics of the Fair designed and implemented; (v) Systematization  of the experience of Fair  designed; (vi) Partnerships established during the fair accompanied and supported; (vii) New lines  of action of FINEP for fostering innovation for sustainable development designed; (viii) FINEP capacity to conceive and implement  new editions of the Fair internalize and (ix) Project executed, monitored and evaluated.

project_descr: BRA/12/001-Promoção da Inovação para o Desenvolvimento Sustentável
